entries.meaning: (nautical) A seaman of a British warship
examples: It never entered his mind that here was a matter which from its extreme questionableness, it was his duty as a loyal blue-jacket to report in the proper quarter.

entries.meaning: (nautical) An enlisted man in the US Navy.

examples: He told me that Buster took her face 'bout right off. Said there's guts and hair everyplace. There's a platoon or so of Payton's bluejackets up there on the View now.
